examples: He said no but he didn't give a reason.
Dijo que no, pero no dio una razón.
She gave no reasons for her decision.
No dio razones de su decisión.
I have no particular reason for doubting him.
No tengo ninguna razón especial para dudar de él.
There were a number of reasons behind her departure.
Hubo varias razones detrás de su partida.
